attributes.action: Make LIFE mean life in  prison for Ian Huntley and other murderers like him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ian Huntley's cowardice meant dragging the parents of those two innocent girls to hell and back, to keep him in jail for life is too good for him but we do not have the death penalty anymore.
I petition the Prime minister to make LIFE MEAN LIFE for people who are found guilty of such crimes- especially ones who are found to have deliberatley misled police in the way Huntley did, causing more pain for the families of victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
